question: Who has been elected the new President of Interpol?
explanation: Kim Jong Yang, a South Korean police officer, has been elected the new   President of Interpol for a two-year term. He succeeded  Meng Hongwei of China. The decision was taken at the 87th General Assembly of the Agency in Dubai, UAE.  The International Criminal Police Organization (INTERPOL) is the international organization that facilitates international police cooperation. Itsâ€™ headquarters is located at Lyo, France. Its work focuses primarily on public safety and battling transnational crimes against humanity, child pornography, cybercrime, drug trafficking, environmental crime, genocide, etc.
